channel.title: nPc talking
channel.description: how do i make an npc talk??

item.description:
@eballer48 wrote:

dude just PM your teamviewer 5 ID and PASS
and ill teach you how to add/delete objects/npc’s
make NPC’s talk and make a Shop…

item.title: nPc talking
item.dc:creator: @deathrs deathrs
item.description:
@deathrs wrote:

i got the solution…

[code] public void process() {

	for (int i = 0; i < maxNPCSpawns; i++) {
		if (npcs[i] == null)
			continue;
		npcs[i].clearUpdateFlags();
	}
	for (int i = 0; i < maxNPCSpawns; i++) {
		if (npcs[i] != null) {
			annoyNpcs(i);
			if (npcs[i].offTimerNPC > 0) {
				npcs[i].offTimerNPC--;
			}
			if (npcs[i].offTimerNPC == 1) {
				npcs[i].hitIDNPC = 0;
			}
			if (npcs[i].actionTimer > 0) {
				npcs[i].actionTimer--;
			}

//talking npc
if (npcs[i].npcType == 1152) {
if (misc.random2(10) == 1) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “text here.”;}
}
[/code]

it needed to declare the i first…
so check the code and try that

Read full topic

item.title: nPc talking
item.dc:creator: @iamminesmith iamminesmith
item.description:
@iamminesmith wrote:

ugh wow, i should have backed this up before i messed with it, i have 76 errors and no clue how to fix it

this is what i got now public void process() {
for (int i = 0; i < maxNPCSpawns; i++) {
if (npcs == null)

     npcs.clearUpdateFlags();

}
for (int i = 0; i < maxNPCSpawns; i++) {
if (npcs != null) {
annoyNpcs(i);
if (npcs.offTimerNPC > 0) {
npcs.offTimerNPC–;
}
if (npcs.offTimerNPC == 1) {
npcs.hitIDNPC = 0;
}
if (npcs.actionTimer > 0) {
npcs.actionTimer–;
}
if (npcs.IsDead == false) {
if ((npcs.actionTimer == 0)
&& (npcs.IsClose == true)) {
for (int j = 1; j < server.playerHandler.maxPlayers; j++) {
if (server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
server.playerHandler.players[j].RebuildNPCList = false;
}
}

                 if (npcs.Respawns) {
                    int old1 = (npcs.npcType - 1);
                    int old2 = npcs.makeX;
                    int old3 = npcs.makeY;
                    int old4 = npcs.heightLevel;
                    int old5 = npcs.moverangeX1;
                    int old6 = npcs.moverangeY1;
                    int old7 = npcs.moverangeX2;
                    int old8 = npcs.moverangeY2;
                    int old9 = npcs.walkingType;
                    int old10 = npcs.MaxHP;
                    npcs = null;
                    newNPC(old1, old2, old3, old4, old5, old6,
                          old7, old8, old9, old10, true);
                 }
           } else if (npcs.RandomWalk == true && misc.random2(10) == 1 && npcs.moverangeX1 > 0 && npcs.moverangeY1 > 0 && npcs.moverangeX2 > 0 && npcs.moverangeY2 > 0) { //Move NPC
              int MoveX = misc.random(1);
              int MoveY = misc.random(1);
              int Rnd = misc.random2(4);
              if (Rnd == 1) {
                 MoveX = -(MoveX);
                 MoveY = -(MoveY);
              } else if (Rnd == 2) {
                 MoveX = -(MoveX);
              } else if (Rnd == 3) {
                 MoveY = -(MoveY);
              }
              if (IsInRange(i, MoveX, MoveY) == true) {
                 npcs.moveX = MoveX;
                 npcs.moveY = MoveY;
              }
              npcs.updateRequired = true;
           }
           if ((npcs.RandomWalk == false)
                 && (npcs.IsUnderAttack == true)
                 && (npcs.effects[0] == 0)) {
              if ((npcs.npcType == 1645)
                    || (npcs.npcType == 509)
                    || (npcs.npcType == 1241)
                    || (npcs.npcType == 1246)
                    || (npcs.npcType == 2591)
                    || (npcs.npcType == 1250))
                 AttackPlayerMage(i);
              else
                 AttackPlayer(i);
           } else if (npcs.followingPlayer
                 && (npcs.followPlayer > 0)
                 && (server.playerHandler.players[npcs.followPlayer] != null)
                 && (server.playerHandler.players[npcs.followPlayer].currentHealth > 0)                     && (npcs.getWho == server.playerHandler.players[npcs.followPlayer].playerName)
                 && (npcs.effects[0] == 0)) {
              if (server.playerHandler.players[npcs.followPlayer].AttackingOn > 0 ) {
                 int follow = npcs.followPlayer;
                 npcs.StartKilling = server.playerHandler.players[follow].AttackingOn;
                 npcs.RandomWalk = true;
                 npcs.IsUnderAttack = true;
                 if (npcs.StartKilling > 0) {
                    if ((npcs.npcType == 1645)
                          || (npcs.npcType == 509)
                          || (npcs.npcType == 1241)
                          || (npcs.npcType == 1246)
                          || (npcs.npcType == 2591)
                          || (npcs.npcType == 2025)
                          || (npcs.npcType == 1250))
                       AttackPlayerMage(i);
                    else
                       AttackPlayer(i);
                 }

              } else {
                 FollowPlayer(i);
              }
           } else if (npcs.followingPlayer
                 && (npcs.followPlayer > 0)
                 && (server.playerHandler.players[npcs.followPlayer] != null)
                 && (server.playerHandler.players[npcs.followPlayer].currentHealth > 0)
                 && (npcs.effects[0] == 0)) {      
              if (server.playerHandler.players[npcs.followPlayer].attacknpc > 0) {
                 int follow = npcs.followPlayer;
                 npcs.attacknpc = server.playerHandler.players[follow].attacknpc;
                 npcs.IsUnderAttackNpc = true;
                 npcs[npcs.attacknpc].IsUnderAttackNpc = true;
                 if (npcs.attacknpc > 0) {
                    if ((npcs.npcType == 1645)
                          || (npcs.npcType == 509)
                          || (npcs.npcType == 1241)
                          || (npcs.npcType == 1246)
                          || (npcs.npcType == 2591)
                          || (npcs.npcType == 2025)
                          || (npcs.npcType == 1250))
                       AttackNPCMage(i);
                    else
                       AttackNPC(i);
                 }

item.title: nPc talking
item.dc:creator: @iamminesmith iamminesmith
item.description:
@iamminesmith wrote:

public void process() {
for (int i = 0; i < maxNPCSpawns; i++) {
if (npcs[i] == null)

		npcs[i].clearUpdateFlags();

}
for (int i = 0; i < maxNPCSpawns; i++) {
if (npcs[i] != null) {
annoyNpcs(i);
if (npcs[i].offTimerNPC > 0) {
npcs[i].offTimerNPC–;
}
if (npcs[i].offTimerNPC == 1) {
npcs[i].hitIDNPC = 0;
}
if (npcs[i].actionTimer > 0) {
npcs[i].actionTimer–;
}
if (npcs[i].IsDead == false) {
if ((npcs[i].actionTimer == 0)
&& (npcs[i].IsClose == true)) {
for (int j = 1; j < server.playerHandler.maxPlayers; j++) {
if (server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
server.playerHandler.players[j].RebuildNPCList = false;
}
}

						if (npcs[i].Respawns) {
							int old1 = (npcs[i].npcType - 1);
							int old2 = npcs[i].makeX;
							int old3 = npcs[i].makeY;
							int old4 = npcs[i].heightLevel;
							int old5 = npcs[i].moverangeX1;
							int old6 = npcs[i].moverangeY1;
							int old7 = npcs[i].moverangeX2;
							int old8 = npcs[i].moverangeY2;
							int old9 = npcs[i].walkingType;
							int old10 = npcs[i].MaxHP;
							npcs[i] = null;
							newNPC(old1, old2, old3, old4, old5, old6,
									old7, old8, old9, old10, true);
						}
				} else if (npcs[i].RandomWalk == true && misc.random2(10) == 1 && npcs[i].moverangeX1 > 0 && npcs[i].moverangeY1 > 0 && npcs[i].moverangeX2 > 0 && npcs[i].moverangeY2 > 0) { //Move NPC
					int MoveX = misc.random(1);
					int MoveY = misc.random(1);
					int Rnd = misc.random2(4);
					if (Rnd == 1) {
						MoveX = -(MoveX);
						MoveY = -(MoveY);
					} else if (Rnd == 2) {
						MoveX = -(MoveX);
					} else if (Rnd == 3) {
						MoveY = -(MoveY);
					}
					if (IsInRange(i, MoveX, MoveY) == true) {
						npcs[i].moveX = MoveX;
						npcs[i].moveY = MoveY;
					}
					npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
				}
				if ((npcs[i].RandomWalk == false)
						&& (npcs[i].IsUnderAttack == true)
						&& (npcs[i].effects[0] == 0)) {
					if ((npcs[i].npcType == 1645)
							|| (npcs[i].npcType == 509)
							|| (npcs[i].npcType == 1241)
							|| (npcs[i].npcType == 1246)
							|| (npcs[i].npcType == 2591)
							|| (npcs[i].npcType == 1250))
						AttackPlayerMage(i);
					else
						AttackPlayer(i);
				} else if (npcs[i].followingPlayer
						&& (npcs[i].followPlayer > 0)
						&& (server.playerHandler.players[npcs[i].followPlayer] != null)
						&& (server.playerHandler.players[npcs[i].followPlayer].currentHealth > 0)							&& (npcs[i].getWho == server.playerHandler.players[npcs[i].followPlayer].playerName)
						&& (npcs[i].effects[0] == 0)) {
					if (server.playerHandler.players[npcs[i].followPlayer].AttackingOn > 0 ) {
						int follow = npcs[i].followPlayer;
						npcs[i].StartKilling = server.playerHandler.players[follow].AttackingOn;
						npcs[i].RandomWalk = true;
						npcs[i].IsUnderAttack = true;
						if (npcs[i].StartKilling > 0) {
							if ((npcs[i].npcType == 1645)
									|| (npcs[i].npcType == 509)
									|| (npcs[i].npcType == 1241)
									|| (npcs[i].npcType == 1246)
									|| (npcs[i].npcType == 2591)
									|| (npcs[i].npcType == 2025)
									|| (npcs[i].npcType == 1250))
								AttackPlayerMage(i);
							else
								AttackPlayer(i);
						}

					} else {
						FollowPlayer(i);
					}
				} else if (npcs[i].followingPlayer
						&& (npcs[i].followPlayer > 0)
						&& (server.playerHandler.players[npcs[i].followPlayer] != null)
						&& (server.playerHandler.players[npcs[i].followPlayer].currentHealth > 0)
						&& (npcs[i].effects[0] == 0)) {		
					if (server.playerHandler.players[npcs[i].followPlayer].attacknpc > 0) {
						int follow = npcs[i].followPlayer;
						npcs[i].attacknpc = server.playerHandler.players[follow].attacknpc;
						npcs[i].IsUnderAttackNpc = true;
						npcs[npcs[i].attacknpc].IsUnderAttackNpc = true;
						if (npcs[i].attacknpc > 0) {
							if ((npcs[i].npcType == 1645)
									|| (npcs[i].npcType == 509)
									|| (npcs[i].npcType == 1241)
									|| (npcs[i].npcType == 1246)
									|| (npcs[i].npcType == 2591)
									|| (npcs[i].npcType == 2025)
									|| (npcs[i].npcType == 1250))
								AttackNPCMage(i);
							else
								AttackNPC(i);
						}

where can i paste the talker?
